summary: First attempt of a challenge I've set to get a good picture of a hoverfly hovering. I like the OOF of this but some way to go! I...
caption: First attempt of a challenge I’ve set to get a good picture of a hoverfly hovering. I like the OOF of this but some way to go! I couldn’t zoom in and out quick enough to keep up with its movements.

reblog.comment: First attempt of a challenge I’ve set to get a good picture of a hoverfly hovering. I like the OOF of this but some way to go! I couldn’t zoom in and out quick enough to keep up with its movements.
